key_risks: Regulatory Risks: Delays in FDA approvals for new products and updates could hinder growth.
Supply Chain Vulnerabilities: Dependence on a limited number of third-party suppliers for critical components.
Intense Competition: Pressure from established players and emerging startups in the diabetes technology space.
Pricing and Reimbursement Challenges: Difficulty in securing favorable reimbursement rates from insurance providers.
Customer Support Issues: Dissatisfaction with customer service and technical support.
controversies: Customer dissatisfaction with support and service quality.
Potential delays in regulatory approvals impacting product launches.
social_issues: Customer support issues affecting customer retention and brand reputation.
governance_issues: Compliance with the California Transparency in Supply Chains Act, indicating a commitment to ethical sourcing and supply chain transparency.
